verses.roman:
'beḍā-nṛtya' mahāprabhu kari' kata-kṣaṇa
mandirera pāche rahi' karaye kīrtana

synonyms: beḍā-nṛtya—the dancing surrounding the temple; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kari'—performing; kata-kṣaṇa—for some time; mandirera pāche—at the rear of the temple; rahi'—staying; karaye—performed; kīrtana—congregational chanting.
translation: After circumambulating the temple, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu for some time remained at the rear of the temple and continued His saṅkīrtana.
